snippet: Recent attacks, possibly by militants, are jeopardizing critical efforts to wipe out polio in Pakistan.
abstract: Editorial warns the murders of charity and aid workers in Pakistan has dealt a devastating blow to  national campaign to wipe out polio and other deadly diseases; calls for greater safety protections for such workers.
lead_paragraph: Recent attacks, possibly by militants, are jeopardizing critical efforts to wipe out polio in Pakistan.

headline.seo: The War on Pakistan’s Aid Workers
headline.main: The War on Pakistan’s Aid Workers
headline.print_headline: The War on Pakistan’s Aid Workers
